text: I eto - te, kotoryye ne verovali v znameniya Allakha - dokazatel'stvo Yego moshchi - i otritsali Den' voskreseniya i raschot, nagradu i nakazaniye. Ikh deyaniya tshchetny, i v Sudnyy den' oni zasluzhat tol'ko unizheniye i prenebrezheniye. Ikh deyaniya ne budut imet' nikakogo vesa i znacheniya
